name: Journey Through "The Da Vinci Code" Part 2 Online Quiz | Literature | 10 Questions

questions.text: Whose plane did Sophie, Robert, and Leigh take to fly to London?
options: They stole it from the police
questions.explanation:
Leigh's plane.

	They took Leigh's Hawker 731 twin garret to London. Leigh's butler, Remy, also accompanied them.

questions.text: What word opened the first cryptex?
questions.explanation:
Sofia.

	Sofia was Greek for Wisdom. When the cryptex opened, there was a note inside with instructions to go to London and find the tomb of a knight that a pope interred. Leigh knew where they should look.

questions.text: Did Remy and Silas kidnap Sophie?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Leigh was kidnapped by Silas and Remy in exchange for the cryptex. Remy tied Leigh up and put him in the trunk of his car.

questions.text: What was the name of the pope that Robert found in the cryptex message?
questions.explanation:
Alexander Pope & Alexander.

	They figured out that 'the knight a pope interred' meant that Alexander Pope buried Sir Isaac Newton.

questions.text: Who do Robert and Sophie believe the "Teacher" is?
questions.explanation:
Leigh.

	After finding out that Leigh was the Teacher, Robert and Sophie learned that he had planned all along to get the cryptex, but then Robert and Sophie walked into his house wanting help in how to open the cryptex.

questions.text: What word did Robert use to open the second cryptex?
questions.explanation:
Apple.

	Leigh was threatening to kill Sophie if Robert didn't hand over the second cryptex. While staring out the window, Robert guessed the word that opened up the second cryptex because the apple was the object that struck Isaac Newton on the head. Robert made Teabing think he destroyed the cryptex. After Captain Fache apprehended Teabing, Robert told him that he had the map hidden in the cryptex.

questions.text: Where did the map in the second cryptex lead Robert and Sophie?
questions.explanation:
To her grandmother and brother.

	Sophie thought her grandmother and brother died in a car accident, but the Priory hid Sophie's grandmother and brother so they wouldn't be killed. Sophie then lived with her grandfather, Jacques Sauniere. Sophie's grandmother told Robert that one day he would figure out where the Holy Grail was and then he would have to keep the secret.

questions.text: In what country did Robert and Sophie agree to meet in one month?
questions.explanation:
Italy.

	Robert was going to be at a conference next month in Florence so he and Sophie planned to meet there.

Yes.

	He woke up in the middle of the night knowing where it was located.

questions.text: In what place did Robert find the Holy Grail?
questions.explanation:
Louvre.

	Robert went to the Louvre and found a large pyramid hanging over a smaller pyramid in the floor of the museum and realized that he had found the Holy Grail, as the pyramid formed the sword and the chalice from the clue.
